directions: Spread 1 1/2 teaspoons chocolate-hazelnut spread onto 4 of the graham cracker halves. Spread 1 1/2 teaspoons marshmallow cream onto the remaining 4 graham cracker halves. Press 1 chocolate-hazelnut graham cracker half together with 1 marshmallow cream half. Repeat with remaining graham crackers.
ingredients: 4 whole graham crackers, broken into two square halves
title: Easy No-Cook Nutella® Smores
